conversations.content: What significant event took place on Oct 3, 2024, involving the sons of Imam Khamenei?

On Oct 3, 2024, acting on behalf of Imam Khamenei, his sons visited several injured Lebanese fighters and members of Hezbollah’s Islamic Resistance who had been brought to Tehran for medical treatment. During this visit, the wounded Lebanese forces emphasized that the battle against the Zionists would not stop even with Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah’s martyrdom.
Why were the Lebanese fighters and members of Hezbollah’s Islamic Resistance in Tehran?

The Lebanese fighters and members of Hezbollah’s Islamic Resistance were in Tehran to complete their medical treatment after being injured or disabled in recent attacks on Lebanon. They came from various age groups, including infants, young children, and teenagers.
How did the injured Lebanese forces react to the visit by the sons of Imam Khamenei?

Despite their various physical pains and injuries, the victims of the crimes perpetrated by the Zionist terrorist gang warmly welcomed the representatives of the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a friendly, spiritual atmosphere.
What messages did the sons of Imam Khamenei convey to the injured individuals?

The sons of Imam Khamenei conveyed the Leader of the Islamic Revolution's greetings and salutations to the injured individuals. They also enquired into the details and progress of the ongoing medical procedures and treatment of these individuals from the relevant officials.
What were the key topics discussed by the injured and the Resistance fighters during their meeting with the Leader’s representatives?

The key topics discussed included an emphasis on continuing the path started by Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah in the fight against the Zionist regime, an expression of gratitude to the people of Iran for their support of the Resistance, and appreciation of the dedicated efforts of Iranian doctors and nurses.
What was the mental and spiritual state of the fighters and those with them during the visit?

The fighters and those who were with them were in a good mental and spiritual state and were highly prepared despite their physical injuries. They asked the Leader’s sons to send their regards to their father and requested that the Leader pray for the victory of the Resistance Front.
What message did the fighters convey regarding the battle against the Zionist regime?

The fighters conveyed a heartfelt confidence that the sacred battle against the Zionist regime would not stop. It would continue undeterred by the bitter events that had taken place, including the martyrdom of Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah.
How did the fighters feel about the loss of Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah?

The fighters emphasized that even though they had lost a cherished figure in the martyrdom of Sayyid Hassan Nasrallah, they still felt the presence of Imam Khamenei, who is the spiritual father of Lebanon’s Islamic Resistance. And the battle would continue under his leadership and guidance.
What was the atmosphere like during the visit by the Leader’s sons?

The visits took place in such a warm, spiritual environment that some of those who were also present in this visit were inspired and moved by the heroic, faithful spirit of the Lebanese fighters and their companions too.
What did the Leader’s sons say about the Islamic Resistance fighters of Lebanon?

The Leader’s sons stressed that the Islamic Resistance fighters of Lebanon and their sacred struggle against the Zionist regime are a source of pride, and not just for Iranians but for all Muslims worldwide. They said that supporting this battle and its fighters is the duty of all Muslims, and they praised their jihad on the path of God.
What gifts were presented during the visit by the Leader’s sons?

Spiritual gifts sent by the Leader of the Islamic Revolution were presented during this visit, including the Holy Quran and a personal message from Imam Khamenei to the injured and the fighters of the Islamic Resistance.
What was the content of the message from the Leader of the Revolution addressed to the wounded fighters of the Resistance?

The full text of the message from the Leader of the Revolution addressed to the wounded fighters of the Resistance is as follows: 'In the Name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful. My dear ones! You have been victorious in this divine test. Your patience and steadfastness are some of the greatest forms of jihad. I pray to Almighty God for your healing and well-being, and may you have a blessed ending to your life [in the future]. Sayyid Ali Khamenei. Sept. 30, 2024.'
What did the Leader’s sons express hope for regarding the injured fighters?
The Leader’s sons expressed their hope that the injured would be able to return to their country following their treatment.

The sons of Imam Khamenei visited the injured Lebanese fighters and members of Hezbollah’s Islamic Resistance in Tehran, acting on behalf of the Leader of the Islamic Revolution.
